title: "AI training bill becomes law"
excerpt: "President Joe Biden signed a bipartisan bill to create an artificial intelligence training program for acquisition workforce into law on Monday. The proposal, called the AI Training Act, cleared the Senate in late 2021 after being introduced by the top Democrat and Republican on the Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs Committee Sens."
